com.lavanya.api.controller

Class ChildcareController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lavanya.api.controller.ChildcareController

  • @RestController
public class ChildcareController
extends java.lang.Object
    Rest Controller to control all the requests related to Childcare object.

    • Method Detail

      • saveChildcare

        @PostMapping(value="/saveChildcare")
public ChildcareDto saveChildcare(@RequestBody
                                                                        ChildcareDto childcareDto)
        POST requests for /saveChildcare endpoint. method to save a Childcare in database.
        Parameters:
        childcareDto - object that needs to be mapped to childcare entity and saved in DB.
        Returns:
        ChildcareDto

      • getChildcareById

        @GetMapping(value="/childcare/{id}")
public ChildcareDto getChildcareById(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                           int childcareId)
        GET requests for /childcare/{id} endpoint. method to retrieve a particular childcare from DB using its id.
        Parameters:
        childcareId - id of the childcare of interest.
        Returns:
        ChildcareDto object.

      • saveChildrenToWatchToChildcare

        @PostMapping(value="/saveChildrenToWatch/{childrenToWatchId}/{childcareId}")
public void saveChildrenToWatchToChildcare(@PathVariable(value="childrenToWatchId")
                                                                                                                         int childrenToWatchId,
                                                                                                                         @PathVariable(value="childcareId")
                                                                                                                         int childcareId)
        POST requests for saveChildrenToWatch/{childrenToWatchId}/{childcareId} endpoint. method to add a Children to watch to a childcare and save it in DB.
        Parameters:
        childrenToWatchId - id of the children to watch.
        childcareId - id of the childcare for which the children needs to be associated.

      • deleteChildrenToWatchInChildcare

        @PostMapping(value="/deleteChildrenToWatch/{childrenToWatchId}/{childcareId}")
public void deleteChildrenToWatchInChildcare(@PathVariable(value="childrenToWatchId")
                                                                                                                             int childrenToWatchId,
                                                                                                                             @PathVariable(value="childcareId")
                                                                                                                             int childcareId)
        POST requests for /deleteChildrenToWatch/{childrenToWatchId}/{childcareId} endpoint. method to delete a Children to watch associated to childcare.
        Parameters:
        childrenToWatchId - id of the children to delete from childcare.
        childcareId - id of the childcare for which the children needs to be deleted.

      • completeChildcareRequest

        @PostMapping(value="validate/request/childcare/{childcareId}")
public void completeChildcareRequest(@PathVariable(value="childcareId")
                                                                                                     int childcareId)
        POST requests for validate/request/childcare/{childcareId} endpoint. method to add all the information not added yet to an already existing and uncomplete childcare.
        Parameters:
        childcareId - id of the childcare that needs to be completed.

      • validateOrNotChildcare

        @PostMapping(value="/validate/childcare")
public void validateOrNotChildcare(@RequestBody
                                                                              ChildcareDto childcareDto)
        POST requests for /validate/childcare endpoint. method to update the validation status of an already existing childcare as validated/accepted or not by the user in charge.
        Parameters:
        childcareDto - thats needs to be updated.

      • deleteChildcare

        @PostMapping(value="/deleteChildcare/{childcareId}")
public void deleteChildcare(@PathVariable(value="childcareId")
                                                                                  int childcareId)
        POST requests for /deleteChildcare/{childcareId} endpoint. method to delete a childcare from DB.
        Parameters:
        childcareId - id of the childcare to delete.

      • accomplishChildcare

        @PostMapping(value="/accomplish/childcare/{childcareId}")
public void accomplishChildcare(@PathVariable(value="childcareId")
                                                                                           int childcareId)
        POST requests for /accomplish/childcare/{childcareId} endpoint. method to mark a childcare as accomplished by the user in charge.
        Parameters:
        childcareId - id of the childcare to mark as accomplished.

      • getChildcaresOfUserInNeedNotCommented

        @GetMapping(value="/userInNeed/childcares/Uncommented")
public java.util.List<ChildcareDto> getChildcaresOfUserInNeedNotCommented()
        GET requests for /userInNeed/childcares/Uncommented endpoint. method to retrieve list of all ChildcareDtos made by a user in need and not commented yet by him.
        Returns:
        list of ChildcareDtos.

                                                                                                                                        java.lang.String token)
        GET requests for /userInCharge/childcares/ToAccomplish endpoint. method to retrieve list of all ChildcareDtos made by a user in charge and not accomplished yet by him.
        Parameters:
        token - required for authentication
        Returns:
        list of ChildcareDtos.

        Integer.

        GET requests for /userInCharge/count/childcaresToComment endpoint. method to count the amount of all childcares accomplished but not commented yet by a user of interest identified as the user in charge.

        Integer for the count of childcares to comment.
